General.Name: Tambovskaya Energosbytovaya
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Tambov Power Supply Company supplies electricity in the Tambov region, Russia. The company provides electricity to approximately 5,900 legal entities and 257,000 individuals. It serves industrial enterprises, and housing and communal sectors. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Tambov, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Tambov Power Supply Company operates as a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Inter RAO UES.
